dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6676 IH: Expanding Military Sexual Assault Data Collection Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Levin (for himself and Ms. Escobar) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to expand the matters covered by the Armed Forces Workplace and Gender Relations Surveys.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Expanding Military Sexual Assault Data Collection Act.

section.header: Expansion of matters covered by Armed Forces Workplace and Gender Relations Surveys
section.text: Subsection (c) of section 481 of title 10, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraphs (3), (4), and (5) as paragraphs (4), (5), and (6), respectively; and
by inserting after paragraph (2) the following new paragraph:
Indicators of the assault (including unwanted sexual contact) that give reason to believe that the victim was targeted, or discriminated against, or both, for a status in a group.
